BBEX3.A.GBP.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in the United Kingdom / EUR 1 = GBP ... (middle)
General: * Bank of England closing rates.
Source: Since 2010 Bank of England, London 1999 - 2009 Financial Times, London
Methodology: 1999, 2000 and from 2012 calculated on the basis of month-end rates, from 2001 to 2011 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.
